basics.name: Itay Nakash
basics.label: Research Scientist at IBM and MSc Candidate at the Technion
basics.summary: I am an AI safety and security researcher with a focus on identifying vulnerabilities in AI systems and enhancing autonomous agent safety. My work involves developing techniques to adapt LLM vocabularies for domain-specific applications, aimed at increasing robustness and reliability across various AI-driven tasks.

education.summary: Researching vocabulary adaptation techniques to improve performance in domain-specific Large Language Models (LLMs). Advisor: Prof. Roi Reichart.
Gained expertise in data science, machine learning, and NLP, building a foundation in theoretical and practical applications of AI.

work.name: IBM Research
work.summary: Researching vulnerabilities and defense strategies for LLM-based AI agents, focusing on safety and security mechanisms.
